comments.text: Very good hitchhiking spot, the citizens are used to foreigners in that area. i got a ride in less than 5 minutes from a nice Korean lady in a Mercedes.

tried to hitch a ride to china, only had to wait about 5 minutes to get a lift, I think they got the destination wrong though because I was dropped off at some weird camp where they made me do a bunch of work and beat me up a lot
